column4: hey.. having problems configuring a simple samba file server....
just want users to be able to login under their unix user names (tho I
from a windows xp client it prompts for username/passwd
but just says share is inacessible
even if it is a root (browseing?) path (ie \\bree)
You have to setup the conf properly..
k... this is actually on a debian (testing) server... but figured ubuntu ppl might know
I've read through the samba 3 howto (the official one) and couldnt' find anything
you could always install swat heh
just apt-get it and browse to localhost:901
any idea offhand tho.. it's pretty weird
It's just a setting in ur config i'm pretty sure
